AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Federico Saldana: defendant in a case involving a motion to suppress, truck driver, has a history of arrests including smuggling of illegal aliens and drugs, exhibited signs of nervousness during questioning, served 9 years in federal prison, completed probation 3 years prior, drove the truck and trailer to a tire shop, gave consent to search the truck and trailer, was placed under arrest, moved to suppress cocaine under his rights, individual disputing the basis for the traffic stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jason Cox: Deputy who initiated the traffic stop, handled paperwork and searched for registration documents, officer who pulled Saldana over
